page.title: 11FASHION-LT.GADDESDEN AREA
page.content: Children's fashion- Nowadays we have digital watches not clock works which was the fashion until 1979.The shoes are different as well,now we have plimsoll type trainers with velcro to do them up. We have brightly coloured socks, skin tight jeans,baggy trousers made by a company called Kikko and Stallion.We have collarless short- sleeved shirts,a shirt called Splashed Colours,jelly shoes and girl's pixie boots.The hair styles are Layered Hair which is when your hair is styled so that the front stands up.Can be high-lighted. Adult's fashion- They wear casual things like jumpsuits.Men wear soft suede shoes and trainers,lace-up leather shoes.The hair style is short hair or layered hair. A business man wears a suit and tie,otherwise casual Ladies like shocking pink colour.
